# MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.none

**Case**

There is no now playing media item.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Media types

- **MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.audio**: The now playing media item is an audio item.
- **MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.video**: The now playing media item is a video item.

items.description: The now playing media item is an audio item.
items.name: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.audio

items.description: The now playing media item is a video item.
items.name: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.video

title: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.none
